name: Sprite
description: An animated object that is the building block of most projects.

conditions.name: Is playing
conditions.description: Test which of the object's animations is currently playing.

params.name: Animation
params.description: Enter the name of the animation to check if playing.

conditions.name: Compare frame
conditions.description: Test which animation frame is currently showing.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the current animation frame number (0-based).

params.name: Number
params.description: The animation frame number to compare to (0-based).

conditions.name: On finished
conditions.description: Triggered when an animation has finished.

params.name: Animation
params.description: Enter the name of the animation that has finished.

conditions.name: On any finished
conditions.description: Triggered when any animation has finished.

conditions.name: On frame changed
conditions.description: Triggered when the current animation frame changes.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the current animation speed.

params.name: Number
params.description: The animation speed to compare to.

conditions.name: Is mirrored
conditions.description: True if the object has been mirrored with the 'Set Mirrored' action.

conditions.name: Is flipped
conditions.description: True if the object has been flipped with the 'Set Flipped' action.

conditions.name: Collisions enabled
conditions.description: True if the object's collisions are enabled and will fire collision events.

conditions.name: On image URL loaded
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load image from URL' when the image has finished loading.

conditions.name: On image URL failed
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load image from URL' if the image fails to load.
conditions.display_text: On image URL failed to load

conditions.name: Compare frame tag
conditions.description: Compare against the current animation frame's tag.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the current animation frame's tag.

params.name: tag
params.description: The animation frame tag to compare against.

actions.name: Stop
actions.description: Stop the current animation from playing.

actions.name: Start
actions.description: Start the current animation, if it was stopped.

params.name: From
params.description: Choose whether to resume or rewind the animation back to the first frame.

params.name: Animation
params.description: The name of the animation to set.

params.name: From
params.description: Choose whether to play from the same frame number or rewind the animation back to the first frame.

actions.name: Set frame
actions.description: Set the current animation frame by its index or tag.

params.name: Frame
params.description: The animation frame index (0-based), or a string of the frame tag.

params.name: Speed
params.description: The new animation speed, in animation frames per second.

actions.name: Set repeat-to frame
actions.description: Set the animation frame number to repeat to in a looping animation.

params.name: Frame number
params.description: The animation frame number to repeat to (0-based).

actions.name: Set blend mode
actions.description: Set the background blend mode for this object.

params.name: Blend mode
params.description: Choose the new blend mode for this object.

actions.name: Set mirrored
actions.description: Set the object horizontally mirrored or back to normal.

params.name: State
params.description: Choose whether to horizontally mirror the object or set it back to normal.

actions.name: Set flipped
actions.description: Set the object vertically flipped or back to normal.

params.name: State
params.description: Choose whether to vertically flip the object or set it back to normal.

actions.name: Spawn another object
actions.description: Create another object at this object.
actions.display_text: Spawn {0} on layer [b]{1}[/b] (image point [i]{2}[/i], create hierarchy: [i]{3}[/i], template: [i]{4}[/i])

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object type of the new instance to create.

params.name: Layer
params.description: The layer name or number to create the instance on.

params.name: Image point
params.description: Use 0 for the object's origin, or the name or number of an image point to spawn the object from.

params.name: Create hierarchy
params.description: Whether to also create all child instances according to the hierarchy in the Layout View.

params.name: Template name
params.description: Use a specific instance as a template when spawning a new object.

actions.name: Set collisions enabled
actions.description: Set whether the object will register collision events or not.

params.name: Collisions
params.description: Whether to enable or disable collisions for this object.

actions.name: Set scale
actions.description: Set the width and height as a multiple of its original size.

params.name: Scale
params.description: The object width and height to set, based on a multiple of its original dimensions, e.g. 1 = original size, 2 = double size, 0.5 = half size etc.

actions.name: Load image from URL
actions.description: Replace the currently displaying animation frame with an image loaded from a web address or data URI.

params.name: URI
params.description: Enter the URL on the web, or data URI, of an image to load.

params.name: Size
params.description: Whether to resize the sprite to the size of the loaded image, or stretch it to the current size.

params.name: Cross-origin
params.description: The cross-origin (CORS) mode to use for the request.

actions.name: Set solid collision filter
actions.description: Use a list of tags to filter collisions with the 'Solid' behavior.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Use 'Inclusive' to only collide with solids with the given tags. Use 'Exclusive' to ignore solids with the given tags.

params.name: Tags
params.description: A space-separated list of tags to filter collisions with.

actions.name: Add/remove animation
actions.description: Add or remove an animation in the object.

params.name: Which
params.description: Whether to add a new animation or remove an existing animation.

params.name: Name
params.description: The animation name to add or remove.

actions.name: Add/remove animation frame
actions.description: Add or remove an animation frame in the current animation.

params.name: Which
params.description: Whether to add a new animation frame or remove an existing animation frame.

params.name: Animation
params.description: The name of the animation to modify.

params.name: Where
params.description: The index or tag at which to insert or delete an animation frame. Use -1 for last frame.

expressions.name: AnimationFrameCount
expressions.description: The number of animation frames in the current animation.

expressions.name: AnimationName
expressions.description: The name of the current animation.

expressions.name: AnimationSpeed
expressions.description: The speed of the current animation, in animation frames per second.

expressions.name: ImageWidth
expressions.description: The width of the current animation frame image, in pixels.

expressions.name: ImageHeight
expressions.description: The height of the current animation frame image, in pixels.

expressions.name: ImagePointX
expressions.description: The X position of one of the object's image points.

params.name: ImagePoint
params.description: Name or number of image point to get.

expressions.name: ImagePointY
expressions.description: The Y position of one of the object's image points.

params.name: ImagePoint
params.description: Name or number of image point to get.

expressions.name: ImagePointCount
expressions.description: The number of image points the current frame has.

expressions.name: OriginalAnimationSpeed
expressions.description: The original speed of the current animation as set in the Animations Editor, in animation frames per second.

expressions.name: PolyPointXAt
expressions.description: The X position of one of the object's collision polygon points.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the collision poly point to get.

expressions.name: PolyPointYAt
expressions.description: The Y position of one of the object's collision polygon points.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the collision poly point to get.

expressions.name: PolyPointCount
expressions.description: The number of collision polygon points the current frame has.

expressions.name: ImagePointZ
expressions.description: The Z position of one of the object's image points.

params.name: ImagePoint
params.description: Name or number of image point to get.

expressions.name: AnimationFrameTag
expressions.description: A string tag to identify an animation frame.
